group_1.narration: The wide blue sky stretches on endlessly…
Once more…the season is upon us.
Summer is coming again.

group_1.textLeft: Aaargh! Why does it have to be rocky?!

group_1.textRight: I don't think we'll be able to split watermelons@like this...
I'm sorry. We came all this way for nothing…

group_1.textLeft: I'm just glad I got to see the ocean at least once@with all of you.
…I wish Mama could've been here to see it.

group_1.narration: Rena, Momoko, Kaede…@Thank you so much for taking me@to the beach before your return@to The Future.
We couldn't do watermelon splitting,@but we got to see the ocean and swim...@It was so much fun!
To think I would be able to spend time@with my friends like that...@The old me couldn't have dreamed it.
I've received so much from all of you...@And I hope I can return the favor someday.

group_1.textLeft: …C'mon, why don't we have fun while we can?

group_1.narration: That day...@The summer I spent with everyone@will remain in my memory forever.
"Seeing you made me want to try harder, too."
That's what Rena said at the end,@and when I asked her what she was doing next...
"I'm going to grow up."
The next day, we went our separate ways,@returning to the places where we belonged.
The seasons have changed since then...@The war with Kuna still rages on,@but I'm doing all I can to bring it to a close.
I still haven't been able to meet Papa,@but I think the day will come@where we can understand each other.

group_1.textCenter: Toyo is nothing more than a little girl practicing@the Spirit Arts! She isn't fit to lead Yamatai!
I am the true successor…@The rightful king of Yamatai!

group_1.narration: One day, after having lost his ties with Kuna,@my uncle abruptly declared himself as king.
He was killed a few days later, however.
He was murdered in his sleep by a Kuna agent.@That's all there was to it…@In a government's eyes, one life means nothing.
I think that was why Mama feared@for me until the very end.
But Mama...there's no need to worry.@I'm standing here as your successor.

group_1.textCenter: …There.
Phew... Exterminating Cursed Gods sure@isn't easy.
But...they were once the candidates@for succession…
I want to ensure, with my own two hands,@that they're put to rest…
This is the place...where Mama would go@to cleanse herself...
Mama…
…I want to see you.
…How can I possibly see you again?
That's right…patience.@I will be a worthy successor...

group_1.textRight: Hm? You were always at Mama's side...

group_1.textLeft: Now my work here is to spread the sacred elixir@upon these boulders.
It's something Lady Himiko used all her@Spirit Arts to make.
I've been applying it and waiting for you@to come here,
so that I may give this to you.
Please strike it against the boulders@after my departure.

group_1.textRight: W-wait, I don't understand what this means.

group_1.textLeft: While I can't give you the details, I can tell you@that Lady Himiko wanted to surprise you.
She troubled herself so much just for this…
...I'm glad the time has finally come.

group_1.textCenter: …She's gone.
So I just strike this against the rocks?
[flashEffect: flashWhite1]Here goes!
Hm? A spark flew out...but that's it.
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][chara:105200:effect_shake]Hah! Yah!
Ugh...I did all of that and nothing happened!
It's pointless. I'm just going to throw this away.
Really, Mama...?@Why would you do this to me?
…Eh?

group_1.narration: ―Toyo―@...Fireflies…?
Before I knew it, countless fireflies@had gathered around me.
Their beautiful light shone gently upon me…
I see...@They must've thought the sparks I created@were the lights of their friends,@and they came over to say hello...
But...there are so many...@Even though the water here is extra clear,@I've never seen this many fireflies...
...Could that be it?@Was it Mama's sacred elixir?
Why did you exert all of your Spirit Arts for this?

group_1.textLeft: I love the lights of fireflies.

group_1.textRight: …Then next time, I'll bring you a night's sky@worth of fireflies.

group_1.narration: ―Toyo―@...
―Toyo―@...Is that why…?
―Toyo―@...You exerted all of your Spirit Arts…@Just…to make me smile…?
―Toyo―@Wh…what were you thinking…?@There was…so much you could have left me…
―Toyo―@Mama... All of your knowledge...@All of your life's work... All of your Spirit Arts...
―Toyo―@Na…nahaha…@Mama…you really…you really…
―Toyo―@I…I love you so much!
My tears burst out like a broken dam,@and I didn't want to stop.@I simply kept crying with everything I had.
As I kept wailing in the utter darkness...@It was as if the sound of my tears was@the only thing that proved I was there.
―Toyo―@Mama…@MAMAAAAAA!
―Toyo―@I miss you!@I want to see you again!
―Toyo―@I wanted to rest my head on your lap more!@I wanted to go to the beach with you!
―Toyo―@I wanted to pick more bamboo shoots with you…@Even though you were better at finding them…
―Toyo―@A-after all…I'm…nothing compared to you…
―Toyo―@I wanted…to laugh with you!
After releasing everything pent up within me,@something pure and clean poured into my chest@to take all its place, and then rushed away...
In that one moment,@I was already becoming okay.@I was getting better enough to turn all@of those things into happy memories.
"When will I become an adult...?"@I used to wonder about that,@and the "someday" that seemed@so far away was suddenly here.
It was devastating.
―Toyo―@Mama...I'm glad I was born...@I'm glad that I'm your daughter!
―Toyo―@Mama…!
Still I only kept on crying,@and the light of the fireflies eventually@ascended towards the night sky.
Mama... As your daughter,@I will live my life to the fullest.
I'll prove with my whole being@that there are no such things as curses...@That there are only blessings in this world.
If those who are born cursed@come to curse this world,@I will show them all my love.
Just as Mama did for me…
As I wept, the light of the fireflies@that had illuminated me continued@to ascend towards the night sky,@eventually disappearing...
Something new was about to begin.
…Summer is about to begin.
